metadata.title: Space Booze! Space Paste EtOH Extraction SUCCESS!
metadata.significance: First documented ethanol extraction of Space Paste - bridges whole spice and essential oil approaches

problem_solved: Space paste tastes terrible - hard to consume
Whole nutmeg causes gastric pain, lethargy, flu-like symptoms
space_booze_theory.hypothesis: Extracting ethanol-soluble hallucinogenic fraction from whole spice produces more pleasant experience with better dosing control
space_booze_theory.key_insight: Space paste actives are ethanol-soluble; extraction allows lower doses to go further via Trojan Horse effect (ethanol crosses blood-brain barrier, carries lipophilic compounds)

materials.ethanol: 750mL high proof (at least 75.5% ABV) - must be consumable
materials.space_paste_modified: Full recipe WITHOUT almonds, pistachios, or maple syrup
materials.container: Glass or stainless steel only - plastic/other metals will leach toxins

procedure: Make space paste leaving out nuts and syrup (1 part = 1 tablespoon)
Mix entire batch with 750mL high proof ethanol
Let settle 15 minutes - two layers form (red ethanol on top, solids on bottom)
Decant clear red liquid from solids
extraction_protocol.final_product: Dark reddish, clear liquid with strong spice smell

theoretical_calculation.batch_contains: 6 doses equivalent to 2 tablespoons paste each
theoretical_calculation.per_dose: 125mL (DO NOT take this much - dangerous alcohol content)

oilman_experience.intensity: About 25% less intense than 2 tablespoons straight paste
oilman_experience.character: More like classic psychedelic (shrooms) vs space paste (heavy oral THC)

dosing_information.onset: Effects begin immediately, pronounced effects after 4 hours
dosing_information.administration: Mix with grape juice or other beverage to mask taste

trial_report.subject: 30 year old male
trial_report.dose: 1.5 oz space booze in 8 oz grape juice

timeline.T0_45: Feels jazzed up, judgment altered, asked out a girl he normally wouldn't talk to
timeline.T4_00: Reports dose was 'great', feeling tired, takes nap
timeline.T14_00: Next day: 'That stuff you gave me was great. I was high all day, even after my nap'

trial_report.subject_description: Like being a little bit drunk, but saw tracers and felt very excited. Got tired toward end, deep sleep.

oilman_color_theory.good_nutmeg: Red/gold color - indicates myristicin (red) and elemicin (gold) presence
oilman_color_theory.bad_nutmeg: Sandy brown color - mostly pulp, minimal psychedelics, causes sickness
oilman_color_theory.visual_test: Subtle difference, visible when comparing side by side

powerfulmedicine_position.evidence: Multiple studies show East Indian nutmeg has 13.5% myristicin vs West Indian <1%

nutmeg_quality_discussion.oilman_counter: Studies show wide variance even within same country - color is more reliable indicator than origin

why_space_paste_works.CYP3A4_inhibition: 60% of first pass liver metabolism - ingredients knock this out
why_space_paste_works.aldehyde_contribution: Link up with allylbenzenes to activate them
why_space_paste_works.ethanol_extraction: Captures aldehydes, MAOIs, CYP3A4 inhibitors, allylbenzenes, and terpenes

theoretical_discussion.space_paste_equals_oilahuasca: Same principle - compounds need activation by inhibiting some enzymes and allowing reactions to occur
theoretical_discussion.space_booze_advantage: Better dosing control than whole spice

enzyme_theory.AlDH_inhibition: Aldehydes inhibit aldehyde dehydrogenase - prevents allylbenzenes from becoming inactive carboxylic acids
enzyme_theory.ADH_induction: Alcohol dehydrogenase turns alcohols into aldehydes (wanted)
enzyme_theory.17bHSD2: Oxidative enzyme - turns alcohol forms of allylbenzenes into phenyl vinyl ketones
enzyme_theory.UGT1A9_UGT2B7: Glucuronosyltransferase enzymes - inactivate allylbenzenes by conjugation

genistein_importance.recommendation: Drink space booze with soy milk, or add pistachios back

methylchavicol_notes.reverse_tolerance: Depletes enzymes over time, eventually activates without helpers
methylchavicol_notes.competitive_inhibitor: May protect other allylbenzenes by occupying destructive enzymes

oilman_nutmeg_butter_research.context: Investigating why whole nutmeg works but essential oil doesn't for most people

trimyristin.effects: Increases anxiety and depression in mice studies
trimyristin.theory: May act as transport system for allylbenzenes - explains time delay (saturated fats slow to process)

macelignan.theory: May contribute to inhibition that opens door to allylbenzene activation

myrislignan.note: Forms interesting metabolites in rat liver studies

oilman_nutmeg_butter_research.conclusion: Nutmeg butter compounds may be why whole nutmeg works vs pure essential oil

issues_with_essential_oils.absorption: Very oily substances hard to absorb; bodies are mostly water
issues_with_essential_oils.processing_time: Takes long time for body to process lipophilic compounds
issues_with_essential_oils.unwanted_compounds: Essential oils contain undesirable high-lipidity compounds (e.g., carvone) that cause gastric pain, headaches
issues_with_essential_oils.oilman_solution: Use whole spices with extraction rather than pure essential oils

primalwisdom_experience.method: 2 whole nuts with mace, ground, extracted in 54% vodka for 1 week

effects.negative: Hideously nauseous, sweaty, tunnel vision, spaced out for 26+ hours
effects.positive: Swaying/pulsing visuals suggested potential worth exploring

primalwisdom_experience.oilman_analysis: Likely overdose - 2 shots may be too much; should start with less

key_insights.ethanol_trojan_horse: Ethanol is water-miscible so crosses blood-brain barrier, carries lipophilic allylbenzenes with it
key_insights.less_is_more: Extraction allows lower doses to produce effects because absorption is enhanced
key_insights.why_nutmeg_works_universally: Contains non-volatile compounds (trimyristin, macelignan, myrislignan) that may aid activation
key_insights.space_paste_not_random: Every ingredient serves a purpose - removing any breaks the chain
key_insights.oilahuasca_theory_incomplete: If oilahuasca worked for everyone, people would use it - something in whole nutmeg is still not understood

substitute_nuts.almonds: Replace with bitter almond extract (aldehydes) or increase cumin

practical_recommendations.administration: Mix space booze with soy milk for genistein + fat + palatability
practical_recommendations.starting_dose: 0.25-0.5mL of nutmeg tincture produced effects in trials
practical_recommendations.avoid: 50% ABV vodka - too weak; 75.5%+ works fine

historical_significance.contribution: Bridge between whole-spice space paste and pure essential oil oilahuasca
historical_significance.innovation: Ethanol extraction removes unpleasant solids while preserving synergistic compounds

method.recovery: Pipette off oil from above solids (~1.3 oz)

results.effects: All normal nutmeg effects but almost NO sedation

olive_oil_extraction_experiment.theory: Olive oil takes ~3.25 hours to digest; allylbenzenes protected until oil metabolized. Trimyristin (saturated fat in whole nutmeg) may similarly transport and protect allylbenzenes.

nutmeg_tincture.method: 11 nutmegs ground, soaked in 2x volume high-proof alcohol for 2 weeks
nutmeg_tincture.sleep: No difficulty; dreaming clear, colorful, positive
nutmeg_tincture.note: Effects can be rekindled by small amount of cannabis

double_space_tincture.method: Distilled volatile components of space paste mixture, then used distillate to extract full space paste
double_space_tincture.effective_dose: As little as 5 DROPS showed noticeable effects
double_space_tincture.recommendation: Double space tincture is 'best of the bunch' and most forgiving

combination_with_classical_psychedelics.tested: Nutmeg tincture + distilled space tincture + cactus or mushrooms
combination_with_classical_psychedelics.result: Very interesting - aroma ingredients create buoyantly positive mindset
combination_with_classical_psychedelics.note: Allylbenzenes may act as amplifiers of classical psychedelic effects

downwardsfromzero_experiments.dill_seed_caution: May cause headache from carvone content; resolved by curry with turmeric, ginger, garlic, black pepper

lysurgeon_dill_seed_work.reason: Experiences 'pretty astounding' - visually active with LSD-like visual style

pre_dosing.activation_tincture: 20ml alcohol + 6 drops cassia oil + 5 drops German chamomile oil

lysurgeon_dill_seed_work.contrast_with_nutmeg: Nutmeg felt similar to anticholinergic for him

piperidine_sources.L_lysine: Converted to piperidine by gut flora over days

why_avoid_dimethylamine: Dimethylamine adducts more susceptible to MAO
Some allylbenzene dimethylamine versions completely inactive (e.g., methyleugenol)

17bHSD2_inhibitors_to_avoid.critical_importance: 17bHSD2 is the SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT enzyme to induce - if not functioning, allylbenzenes cannot produce psychedelic activity

quercetin.duration: Can completely inactivate allylbenzenes for 3-4 hours
quercetin.may_explain: Why nutmeg sometimes doesn't work or has delayed onset

peele_oswald_metabolism_pathway.significance: First published work on allylbenzene alkaloid formation in vivo
peele_oswald_metabolism_pathway.key_finding: Allylbenzenes form alkaloids by reaction with amines (piperidine, dimethylamine) in vivo
pathway_steps: Note: Addition of nitrogen in final step

shulgin_myristicin_study.finding: Only 4 of 10 subjects got effects from pure myristicin at 400mg
shulgin_myristicin_study.notable_subject: Jazz musician experienced with many drugs - no effects from 400mg myristicin
shulgin_myristicin_study.self_experiment: Author Callaway took nutmeg and became 'highly suggestible' - took whiskey, methamphetamine, dimenhydrinate suggested by others; 'unable to think clearly'

curcumin_risk.mechanism: Some people genetically form hepatotoxic metabolite
curcumin_risk.risk_level: Rare, due to genetic variability in metabolic enzymes

safrole_concerns.methylenedioxy_ring: Can form carbene and bind directly to cytochromes
safrole_concerns.context: All spices contain trace safrole; reasonable use likely safe

hepatotoxicity_discussion.perspective: Ethanol remains major cause of liver disease compared to these spice compounds

water_extract_theory.extraction_ratio: 2 tablespoons nutmeg + 1L water (heated) extracts all actives
water_extract_theory.mechanism: Trojan Horse effect - actives sneak into brain with water despite XlogP values
water_extract_theory.dilution_factor: ~300mg actives in 1L water - possibly too dilute for destructive enzymes to fully act

thread_timeline.2014_02: oilman posts original Space Booze recipe and theory
thread_timeline.2014_02_to_03: Discussion with PowerfulMedicine on enzymes, trimyristin, olive oil extraction
thread_timeline.2014_07: downwardsfromzero reports successful nutmeg tincture experiments
thread_timeline.2015_04: lysurgeon shares dill seed tincture success with dillapiole
thread_timeline.2019_01: Double space tincture confirmed effective at 2 teaspoons
thread_timeline.2022_11: Hepatotoxicity discussion; double space tincture recommended as 'best and most forgiving'
